select a.*, p.pname, p.phone as patient_phone, p.id_card_number, d.doctor_id, d.name , d.phone , dept.department_name from appointments a left join patients p on a.patient_id = p.patient_id left join doctors d on a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id left join departments dept on d.department_id = dept.department_id
and p.pname like concat('%', #{patientName}, '%')
and d.name like concat('%', #{doctorName}, '%')
and a.status = #{status}
and date(a.appointment_date) = date(#{appointmentDate})
order by a.appointment_date desc, a.createtime desc
mapper.insert: insert into appointments (patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, status, createtime) values (#{patientId}, #{doctorId}, #{appointmentDate}, #{appointmentTime}, #{status}, #{createtime})
